chara.textHome: Fiiinally!

Listen, there's something I want
you to do for me.
Go buy me some yakisoba.

No, I'm not treating you like a gopher!
I'll go too, duh!

Changed already? Wow, talk about eager.
Oh, you couldn't wait to get to the beach...?
Well, I feel the same way, to be honest.
It's sooo hooot! And I'm huuungry!
I can't take it anymore!

Go buy me an ice cream.
Or some shaved ice.
Come on, get a move on!
It's finally cooled down...
Hmm.

I'm craving...watermelon!
Fetch me some watermelon!

You can take one of the ones
growing in Kaede's vegetable patch.
Heh heh heh...
Time to go!
Where, you ask?
We're gonna go somewhere spooky, duh!
You can play the ghost. No buts!
I'll tell you my secret for a perfect summer.

Crank the AC to max, then eat
ice cream in the cold, mumbling
"I'm freezing!" the whole time.
Perfect, huh?!

Make sure to coat yourself in sunscreen
before going outside.

I'm not gonna take pity on you moaning
about a sunburn afterwards, got it?

If Mirrors takes a copy of me dressed
like this...there'll be more versions of me
in a swimsuit in there...
H-hey! Stop it!
Ugh! No way am I going in my swimsuit!

Summer means those cute little ceramic pigs
that burn anti-mosquito incense!

Their faces are so round...
you can't help but like them...
I love those things.
You do too, right?

Just one sparkler by itself is just a
tiny fireball. Gather a bunch, though,
and it becomes an inferno...
Just like my team!
Ugh...gotta do my homework.

My workbook, and then self-study...
It's suuuch a hassle!
Augh.
I'm busy today, so I'll just do it tomorrow.

When my siblings and I played with
water guns as kids, I tripped on a bucket
we used for reloading.
I think my brother laid them as traps.

Kaede, Momoko, and I were talking
when we went to buy swimsuits...
Momoko cares a bunch about her figure.
She's got a surprisingly girly side to her.
So, my swimsuit...what do you think?
It doesn't look weird, does it?

I never thought I'd be buying a cute swimsuit
for going to the beach with friends...
It's fun!
I'm going to an idol concert this summer!

I'm gonna book us bus tickets,
a place to stay, and get my favorite
member's merch ready!
Sooo excited!
There's a show on the beach?!
You need to wear a swimsuit to get in?!

Augh, I wanna see
Sayu-Sayu in her swimsuit...

It's embarrassing to show her mine,
though...
Now THIS is perfect summer viewing!
Links' Special Concert Ultimate Edition!

Three days of Links live performances
packed into one amazing disc!
